title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Tourism and Sport (Transfer of
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Tourism and Sport (Transfer of 

Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 16 September 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited tourism sport (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order 2020 (2) order come operation 16 september 2020

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of any functions transferred by Article 3 are 
transferred to the Department of Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht. 

(2) References to the Department of Transport, Tourism and Sport contained 
in any Act or any instrument made under such Act and relating to any 
administration and business transferred by paragraph (1) shall, from the 
commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the Department of 
Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred article 3 transferred department culture heritage gaeltacht (2) reference department transport tourism sport contained act instrument made act relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department culture heritage gaeltacht

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Transport, Tourism and Sport
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Transport, Tourism and Sport 

by or under - 

(a) 

(b) 

the Tourist Traffic Acts 1939 to 2016, 

section 847A (inserted by section 41 of the Finance Act 2002 (No. 
5 of 2002) of the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 (No. 39 of 1997), 

(c) 

the Sport Ireland Act 2015 (No. 15 of 2015), 

(d) 

the Intoxicating Liquor Act 2003 (No. 31 of 2003), 

(e) 

the Intoxicating Liquor (National Conference Centre) Act 2010 
(No. 9 of 2010), and 

(f) 

 the Rugby World Cup 2023 Act 2017 (No. 17 of 2017), 

are transferred to the Minister for Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht. 

(2) References to the Minister for Transport, Tourism and Sport contained 
in any Act or instrument made under such Act and relating to any functions 
transferred by this Order shall, from the commencement of this Order, be 
construed as references to the Minister for Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht.
text_norm: 3 (1) function vested minister transport tourism sport - (a) (b) tourist traffic act 1939 2016 section 847a (inserted section 41 finance act 2002 (no 5 2002) tax consolidation act 1997 (no 39 1997) (c) sport ireland act 2015 (no 15 2015) (d) intoxicating liquor act 2003 (no 31 2003) (e) intoxicating liquor (national conference centre) act 2010 (no 9 2010) (f) rugby world cup 2023 act 2017 (no 17 2017) transferred minister culture heritage gaeltacht (2) reference minister transport tourism sport contained act instrument made act relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister culture heritage gaeltacht

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Transport, Tourism and Sport 
is a party and the proceedings have reference to functions transferred by this 
Order to the Minister for Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht, the name of the 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 25th September, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [356] 3 

Minister for Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht shall, in so far as the 
proceedings relate to any function transferred by this Order, be substituted in the 
proceedings for that of the Minister for Transport, Tourism and Sport or added 
in the proceedings, as may be appropriate, and the proceedings shall not abate 
by reason of such substitution.
text_norm: 4 immediately commencement order legal proceeding pending minister transport tourism sport party proceeding reference function transferred order minister culture heritage gaeltacht name notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 25th september 2020 356 3 minister culture heritage gaeltacht shall far proceeding relate function transferred order substituted proceeding minister transport tourism sport added proceeding may appropriate proceeding shall abate reason substitution

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Transport, Tourism and Sport may, in so 
far as it relates to functions transferred by this Order to the Minister for Culture, 
Heritage and 
the Gaeltacht, be carried on or completed from such 
commencement by the Minister for Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht.
text_norm: 5 anything commenced commencement order authority minister transport tourism sport may far relates function transferred order minister culture heritage gaeltacht carried completed commencement minister culture heritage gaeltacht

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in 
the exercise of a function transferred by this Order shall, if and in so far as it was 
operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, have effect from 
such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the Minister for 
Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made exercise function transferred order shall far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister culture heritage gaeltacht

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Transport, Tourism and Sport contained
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Transport, Tourism and Sport contained 
in the memorandum and articles of association of any company and relating to 
any function transferred by this Order shall, from the commencement of this 
Order, be construed as references to the Minister for Culture, Heritage and the 
Gaeltacht.
text_norm: 7 reference minister transport tourism sport contained memorandum article association company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister culture heritage gaeltacht

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the 
commencement of this Order by the Minister for Transport, Tourism and Sport 
in connection with the functions transferred by this Order are transferred to the 
Minister for Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht and, accordingly, without any 
further conveyance, transfer or assignment, on such commencement - 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

that property, real and personal, vests in the Minister for Culture, 
Heritage and the Gaeltacht, 

those rights shall be enjoyed by the Minister for Culture, Heritage 
and the Gaeltacht, and 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Culture, Heritage 
and the Gaeltacht. 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht by this Article which, on the commencement 
of this Order, are standing in the name of the Minister for Transport, Tourism 
and Sport shall, on the request of the Minister for Culture, Heritage and the 
Gaeltacht, be transferred into the name of the Minister for Culture, Heritage and 
the Gaeltacht. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [356] 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

15 September, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
